title: Train service delay between Jurong East and Joo Koon

title_translations.zh-Hans: 裕廊东至裕群之间的列车服务延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api tertangguh di antara Jurong East dan Joo Koon
title_translations.ta: ஜூரோங் ஈஸ்ட் மற்றும் ஜூ கூன் இடையே ரயில் சேவை தாமதம்

updates.text: UPDATE:Train service between Jurong East and Joo Koon in both directions running well again.
Train service between Jurong East and Joo Koon in both directions delayed.  Updates to come
